description:
Named in honor of a mythical salmon river in Gaspésie, this waterproof shell will keep you dry and warm on rainy and windy days. Definitely one of the toughest garments in our jacket collection.

Both lightweight and featuring 3-ply fabric treated with a waterproof finish, it has water-repellent zippers and fully taped seams. Offering great breathability and waterproofness tested to 20,000 millimetres, this waterproof shell-style coat will get you through the weather and cold winds imposed by Mother Nature without ever getting wet. Thanks to its many spacious pockets, you won't run out of space and you can warm your hands after your relaunch and store all your essentials.

With its adjustable hood, two-way armpit opening, Velcro-adjustable cuffs and elastic waist adjustment cord, this coat adapts perfectly to all your needs, on the river or elsewhere, when the weather plays its part.
name: Hooke Matapedia Hardshell Jacket - Mens
